isv.sap.payment.addon.facade.impl

Class CreditCardPaymentFacadeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultPaymentFacade
      • isv.sap.payment.addon.facade.impl.AbstractPaymentFacade
        • isv.sap.payment.addon.facade.impl.CreditCardPaymentFacadeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CreditCardPaymentFacade

    public class CreditCardPaymentFacadeImpl
extends AbstractPaymentFacade
implements CreditCardPaymentFacade
    A custom implementation of payment facade that, on top of DefaultPaymentFacade adds payment logic logic for PayPal and Alternative payments.
